languages.text: "Насколько могу судить, что-то вроде молитвы из нескольких стихов о житии святой культа. Кажется, ее звали Эриана, Мать-паучиха".

traits.locale_text: "Насколько могу судить, что-то вроде молитвы из нескольких стихов о житии святой культа. Кажется, ее звали Эриана, Матерь-паучиха".

languages.text: "From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."
languages.original_text: "Насколько могу судить, что-то вроде молитвы из нескольких стихов о житии святой культа. Кажется, ее звали Эриана, Мать-паучиха".

traits.locale_text: "From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."
"From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."
"From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."
"That is the name the spinners gave it. A secret mantra, a sacred prayer of the Bloodspun Web, a series of verses chronicling the life of Saint Erianne, the cult's originator, the Matriarch Spider."
"From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."
"From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."
"From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."

languages.text: « À ma connaissance, il s'agit d'une sorte de prière dont les versets évoquent la vie de l'une des saintes du culte. Erianne, l'araignée matriarche, c'est ainsi qu'ils la surnomment. »
languages.original_text: "From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."

traits.locale_text: « À ma connaissance, il s'agit d'une sorte de prière dont les versets évoquent la vie de l'une des saintes du culte. Erianne, l'araignée matriarche, c'est ainsi qu'ils la surnomment. »

languages.text: «Hasta donde yo sé, es algo parecido a un rezo con varios versos que narran la vida de una de las figuras santas del culto. Erianne, o la Araña Matriarca, como la llaman ellos».
languages.original_text: "From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."

traits.locale_text: «Hasta donde yo sé, es algo parecido a un rezo con varios versos que narran la vida de una de las figuras santas del culto. Erianne, o la Araña Matriarca, como la llaman ellos».

languages.text: 「我の知る限りでは、カルト教団の聖人の障害を語るいくつかの節からなる祈りのようなものです。『エリアンヌ』や『蜘蛛の師母』と呼ばれていました」
languages.original_text: "From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."

traits.locale_text: 「我の知る限りでは、カルト教団の聖人の障害を語るいくつかの節からなる祈りのようなものです。『エリアンヌ』や『蜘蛛の師母』と呼ばれていました」

languages.text: “据我所知，这好像是某种祷文其中的几句，讲的是拜死教的某个圣人。那个圣人好像是叫埃兰妮，那些人好像称她为‘蛛母族长’。”
languages.original_text: "From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."

traits.locale_text: “据我所知，这好像是某种祷文其中的几句，讲的是拜死教的某个圣人。那个圣人好像是叫埃兰妮，那些人好像称她为‘蛛母族长’。”

languages.text: "Nach allem, was ich weiß, eine Art Gebet mit mehreren Versen, die das Leben einer Heiligen des Kultes beschreiben. Erianne oder die Matriarchenspinne, wie sie sie nennen.
languages.original_text: "From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."

traits.locale_text: "Nach allem, was ich weiß, eine Art Gebet mit mehreren Versen, die das Leben einer Heiligen des Kultes beschreiben. Erianne oder die Matriarchenspinne, wie sie sie nennen.

languages.text: "Anladığım kadarıyla tarikatın azizlerinden birinin yaşamını anlatan birkaç mısralık bir çeşit dua. Azizin adı Erianne. Örümcek Kraliçe de derler."
languages.original_text: "From what I can tell, it's something like a prayer with several verses that tell about the life of one of the cult's saints. Erianne, or the Matriarch Spider, as they call her."
